scholarships.title: Research Scholarship
scholarships.subtitle: University of Turin - Department of Computer Science
scholarships.description: The scholarship titled "Architectures and approaches for elaborating Emergency Room Reports" was held within the project "Analisi automatica delle cartelle di Pronto Soccorso per la prevenzione del Femminicidio". My activity was focused on the development of a system for the analysis and categorization of medical records in order to automatically detect violent cases and extracing relevant information from the violent records.
